analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#211-212) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#213-215)

TokenVault.claim (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#714-732) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lockedAt == 0

TokenVault.claim (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#714-732) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lockedAt == 0
TokenVault.getState (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lockedAt == 0

Recoverable.recoverTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#82-86) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,tokensToBeReturned(token)) (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#85-86)

TokenVault.recoverFailedLock (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#688-699) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#697-698)

TokenVault.claim (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#714-732) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol)

Reentrancy in TokenVault.TokenVault (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#614-640):
	External calls:
	- ! token.isToken() (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#624-626)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- freezeEndsAt (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#639)
	- tokensToBeAllocated (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#639-640)
BasicToken.totalSupply_ should be constant (/unique_chucks/34/0xfad4463c17222f540b65a4f8c9b5c7b88f4eea6e.sol#211-212)
